thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 10 of 171
thread.title: Danielle

author: Danielle
title: Danielle
text: This is a great site to make trusted connections between sitter and owner/fur-parent. This site has met our needs in terms of the amount of listings available, the ease of communication between parties, the ability to request references, and more. One amazing feature is the 24/7 live vet advice line. We have used that a couple times on our house sits, and it gives great peace of mind in addition to having the pet's own vet contact info. We started our house sitting adventure using several different sites, but after a couple years this is the one we've stuck with.
